en.title: How do you want to respond?
en.action: Choose one of the following options.

proceed.heading: Proceeding with the divorce
proceed.summary: If you proceed with the divorce, you won't have to pay any more court fees related to the divorce. You'll be divorced sooner than if you defend the divorce and you usually won't need to attend a court hearing.

proceedButDisagree.heading: Proceeding, but not accepting the allegations
proceedButDisagree.summary:
If you don't agree with what your {{ session.divorceWho }} has said in their divorce application, but you don't want to try to prevent the divorce (you don't want to defend it) you can choose this option. The outcome of the divorce won't be affected if you choose this option.

You won't have to pay any more court fees related to the divorce. You'll be divorced sooner than if you defend the divorce and you usually won't need to attend a court hearing.

defend.heading: Disagreeing with the application (defending)
defend.summary: If you choose to defend the divorce you will have to pay a fee of £245. You may have to both attend a hearing where a judge will decide if the divorce should be granted.

errors.required: Select ‘I will let the divorce proceed’ if you do not want to defend the divorce

proceed.heading: I will let the divorce proceed
proceed.summary: Choose this option if you don't want to try to prevent the divorce (you don't intend to 'defend' it).
proceed.answer: I will let the divorce proceed and won't try to prevent it (I don't intend to 'defend' it).

proceedButDisagree.heading: I will let the divorce proceed, but I don't admit to what my {{ session.divorceWho }} said about me
proceedButDisagree.summary: Choose this option if you don't accept the allegations made in the application, but you don't want to try to prevent the divorce (you don't intend to 'defend' it).
proceedButDisagree.answer: I will let the divorce proceed (I don’t intend to defend it), but I don’t accept the allegations made in the application.

defend.heading: I disagree with the application for divorce
defend.summary: Choose this option if you want to try to prevent the divorce or want to make your own application for divorce (you intend to 'defend' it)
defend.answer: I will try to prevent the divorce based on this application (I intend to 'defend' it)
